alert.note: Alert for Collier; Hendry; Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 4:14PM EDT until April 04 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Collier County in southwestern Florida... Central Hendry County in southern Florida... West central Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 413 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Devils Garden, or 11 miles west of Montura, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees may also occur. * Locations impacted include... Montura, Immokalee, Hendry Correctional, Devils Garden and Keri. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
